q: A flat file is best described as:
choices: A two-dimensional table of rows and columns
explain: Flat files resemble simple tables without relationships.

q: Which advantage do databases have over flat files?
explain: DBMSs support concurrent multiuser access with fine-grained locks.

q: Which benefit relates to growth in users and data size?
explain: Databases scale for more users and larger datasets.

q: Which media improves DB I/O performance versus HDDs?
explain: SSDs provide faster random access.
